ygData.subject: Re: to Korm
ygData.msgSnippet: If you read the description at the beginning, you see the shadow knights of ogguk are at war with the shadow knights of grobb.  Ogre shadow knights will kill
ygData.messageBody:
If you read the description at the beginning, you see the shadow knights of
ogguk are at war with the shadow knights of grobb. Ogre shadow knights will
kill troll shadow knights in Ogguk

----- Original Message -----
From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 7:18 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: to Korm


> From: Seamus McNeill <smcneill@...>
>
> Ok...I wasn't sure how all of Freeport worked....I got bound to the
> outside edge of West Freeport...and rarely go in anyhow...mostly so I
> could get bound closer to ECom and WestCom. As for Grobb and Oggok.
> Trolls and Dark Elves can't travel into Oggok completely safe. There are
> Ogres that will KoS us...as weird as it sounds. I think between evil
> race/class's Trolls and Dark Elves get along the best. From what I
> understand they trust each other the most. I don't really like Ogre's
> anyhow....so no skin off my back.
>
> Korm
> Cazic Thule
>
>
